entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:02 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
